message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $9,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, $9,500 isn't quite what I'm hoping for. Given the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. It's a fair price, and I believe it's still a good deal for you.  Let me know what you think.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering my budget, I am comfortable to go up to $10,500 for the product. I hope this offer is within your acceptable range.
